typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	p_processing_date as string ('2022-04-20'),
	p_run_id as integer (0),
	p_file_name as string ('2022-04-20_DealData.json')
}
source(output(
		GDD_Deal_Data as (Deal_ID as string, Version_Nbr as string, Created_Date as string, Deal_Status as string, CompletedDate as string, Deal_Owner as string, Deal_Total as string, Deal_Total_EUR as string, Customer_Name as string, Opportunity_Name as string, Region as string, Offering as string, Term_Period as string, Contract_Start_Date as string, LastChangeTimestamp as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'sourceFile',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> DealData
DealData foldDown(unroll(GDD_Deal_Data),
	mapColumn(
		Deal_ID = GDD_Deal_Data.Deal_ID,
		Version_Nbr = GDD_Deal_Data.Version_Nbr,
		Created_Date = GDD_Deal_Data.Created_Date,
		Deal_Status = GDD_Deal_Data.Deal_Status,
		CompletedDate = GDD_Deal_Data.CompletedDate,
		Deal_Owner = GDD_Deal_Data.Deal_Owner,
		Deal_Total = GDD_Deal_Data.Deal_Total,
		Deal_Total_EUR = GDD_Deal_Data.Deal_Total_EUR,
		Customer_Name = GDD_Deal_Data.Customer_Name,
		Opportunity_Name = GDD_Deal_Data.Opportunity_Name,
		Region = GDD_Deal_Data.Region,
		Offering = GDD_Deal_Data.Offering,
		Term_Period = GDD_Deal_Data.Term_Period,
		Contract_Start_Date = GDD_Deal_Data.Contract_Start_Date,
		LastChangeTimestamp = GDD_Deal_Data.LastChangeTimestamp,
		sourceFile
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenMain
CleanUpAndDerive select(mapColumn(
		Deal_ID,
		Version_Nbr,
		Created_Date,
		Deal_Status,
		CompletedDate,
		Deal_Owner,
		Deal_Total,
		Deal_Total_EUR,
		Customer_Name,
		Opportunity_Name,
		Region,
		Offering,
		Term_Period,
		Contract_Start_Date,
		LastChangeTimestamp,
		Ingestion_loading_date,
		STG_loading_date,
		run_id,
		STG_checksum,
		is_Last
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRequredFields
FlattenMain derive(Ingestion_loading_date = toDate(substring(sourceFile, (instr(sourceFile, '_DealData.json')-10), 10)),
		STG_loading_date = currentTimestamp(),
		run_id = $p_run_id,
		STG_checksum = sha2(256, byNames(['Deal_ID','Version_Nbr','Created_Date','Deal_Status','CompletedDate','Deal_Owner','Deal_Total','Deal_Total_EUR','Customer_Name','Opportunity_Name','Region','Offering','Term_Period','Contract_Start_Date','LastChangeTimestamp'])),
		is_Last = 1) ~> CleanUpAndDerive
SelectRequredFields sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Deal_Id as string,
		Deal_Version as string,
		Created_Date as string,
		Deal_Status as string,
		Completed_Date as string,
		Deal_Owner as string,
		Deal_Total as string,
		Deal_Total_EUR as string,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Opportunity_Name as string,
		Region as string,
		Offering as string,
		Contract_Start_Date as string,
		Term_Period as string,
		Last_Change_Timestamp as string,
		Is_Last as integer,
		Ingestion_loading_date as string,
		STG_loading_date as timestamp,
		RUN_ID as long,
		STG_checksum as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['TRUNCATE TABLE [STG].[ING_GDD_Deal];'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Deal_Id = Deal_ID,
		Deal_Version = Version_Nbr,
		Created_Date,
		Deal_Status,
		Completed_Date = CompletedDate,
		Deal_Owner,
		Deal_Total,
		Deal_Total_EUR,
		Customer_Name,
		Opportunity_Name,
		Region,
		Offering,
		Contract_Start_Date,
		Term_Period,
		Last_Change_Timestamp = LastChangeTimestamp,
		Is_Last = is_Last,
		Ingestion_loading_date,
		STG_loading_date,
		RUN_ID = run_id,
		STG_checksum
	)) ~> sinkINGGDDDeal
